```{r startpoint, include = FALSE}
startpoint <- Sys.time()
```

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(Spectra)
```

```{r}
for(s in c("tissues", "maturation")){
  for(p in c("POS", "NEG")){
    pth <- paste0(s, "/data/", p,"_DDA_mzML/")
    fls <- list.files(pth)
    ms2 <- Spectra(paste0(pth, fls), backend = MsBackendDataFrame())
    ms2 <- ms2[msLevel(ms2) > 1]
    save(ms2, file = paste0(s, "/data/RData/MS2_library_", p, ".RData"))
  }
}
```
